Posts.Content: Feb 17, 2009 12:27PM kellygowan wrote: I had the DIEP surgery done and it is the best thing I could have ever done! I am so happy and so blessed. they look real, feel real and are real.    Please call me if you want to talk about it!  I am 35, have two kids, had stage III and it was in my lymphs.   I am now in remission and feeling great.   Kelly Gowan 214 641 8788
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy, Mastectomy or Bi-Lateral Mastectomy movinOn movinOn
